citations.narrative:
The licensee has not been following their written Program of Vet Care (PVC). There are 19 adult dogs in the facility that
have not been given the distemper and parvovirus vaccinations. The current PVC prescribes for adult dogs to receive
these vaccinations yearly. Distemper and parvovirus are contagious diseases which can cause illness, stress, and even
death. Correct by ensuring vaccination for contagious and/or deadly diseases of dogs (including distemper and
parvovirus), in accordance with a schedule approved in the PVC, is appropriately followed by the licensee. Correct by:
May 3, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The licensee has not been following their written Program of Vet Care (PVC). There are 19 adult dogs in the facility that 
have not been given the distemper and parvovirus vaccinations. The current PVC prescribes for adult dogs to receive 
these vaccinations yearly. Distemper and parvovirus are contagious diseases which can cause illness, stress, and even 
death.  Correct by ensuring vaccination for contagious and/or deadly diseases of dogs (including distemper and 
parvovirus), in accordance with a schedule approved in the PVC, is appropriately followed by the licensee. Correct by: 
May 3, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
